lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton's search for a running mate is moving into a more intense phase, according to several Democrats, as aides contact a pared-down pool of candidates to ask for reams of personal information and set up interviews with the presumptive Democratic nominee's vetting team.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton's VP Search Moves Into More Intense Phase
headline.print_headline: Hillary Clinton's VP Search Moves Into More Intense Phase
